changeSet.author: zlatkov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `banned` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL, `confirmation_token` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `enabled` tinyint NOT NULL, `reset_password_token` varchar(45) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `reg_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, `test` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `UK_ob8kqyqqgmefl0aco34akdtpe` (`email`) /*!80000 INVISIBLE */ ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=70 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
